How to support Journey

Passionate about community and theatre? Journey is your local community-led drama group that thrives on the dedication of our incredible volunteers, and we'd love for you to join the team! Whether you have a knack for costumes, a talent for tech, a persausive tongue to help spread the Journey mission, or simply a big smile and a willingness to help, there's a place for you. You'll gain new skills, meet fantastic people, and help us bring amazing stories to life for our community. Come be a part of the magic â€“ we can't wait to welcome you to the Journey family!

Get involved

Our volunteers cover all aspects of Journey, take a look at the list below and see which team you would like to get involved with:

  • Physical help - ensuring we have costumes, scripts, and set and staging for our termly showcases
  • Community help - spreading the word of the Journey mission to ensure that everyone knows that we exist!
  • Financial help - helping to ensure that we have access to local funding as well as bids, lottery funding and other government led arts funding
  • Infrastructure help - our building isn't immune to problems, and we always need people that can fix a light, mend a leak and keep the good ship Journey shipshape!
  • Newsletter - for those who can't physically support us, just signing up to be informed about our upcoming volunteer opportunities and showcases is just as useful and important!

If you would like to be part of Journey's mission, then please pop your details below and one of our team will be in touch to discuss where you can lend a hand

  • Journey HQ 123 Drama Lane, Dramatic City, DR4 MA
